AssemblySemFileVer.description: Suitable for .NET AssemblyFileVersion. Defaults to Major.Minor.Patch.0.

AssemblySemVer.description: Suitable for .NET AssemblyVersion. Defaults to Major.Minor.0.0

BranchName.description: The name of the checked out Git branch.

BuildMetaData.description: The build metadata, usually representing number of commits since the VersionSourceSha.

CommitDate.description: The ISO-8601 formatted date of the commit identified by Sha.

CommitsSinceVersionSource.description: The number of commits since the version source.

EscapedBranchName.description: Equal to BranchName, but with / replaced with -.

FullBuildMetaData.description: The BuildMetaData suffixed with BranchName and Sha.

FullSemVer.description: The full, SemVer 2.0 compliant version number.

InformationalVersion.description: Suitable for .NET AssemblyInformationalVersion. Defaults to FullSemVer suffixed by FullBuildMetaData.

Major.description: The major version. Should be incremented on breaking changes.

MajorMinorPatch.description: Major, Minor and Patch joined together, separated by '.'.

Minor.description: The minor version. Should be incremented on new features.

Patch.description: The patch version. Should be incremented on bug fixes.

PreReleaseLabel.description: The pre-release label is the name of the pre-release.

PreReleaseLabelWithDash.description: The pre-release label prefixed with a dash.

PreReleaseNumber.description: The pre-release number is the number of commits since the last version bump.

PreReleaseTag.description: The pre-release tag is the pre-release label suffixed by the PreReleaseNumber.

PreReleaseTagWithDash.description: The pre-release tag prefixed with a dash.

SemVer.description: The semantic version number, including PreReleaseTagWithDash for pre-release version numbers.

Sha.description: The SHA of the Git commit.

UncommittedChanges.description: The number of uncommitted changes present in the repository.

VersionSourceSha.description: The SHA of the commit used as version source.

WeightedPreReleaseNumber.description: A summation of branch specific pre-release-weight and the PreReleaseNumber. Can be used to obtain a monotonically increasing version number across the branches.
